name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Proficient in **Python**, relational databases, and data modeling, with expertise in distributed systems and cloud platforms, particularly **AWS**. Skilled in infrastructure-as-code, container orchestration, and DevOps pipelines, ensuring platform reliability and observability. Accomplished in applying software design patterns and testing practices to enhance performance optimization.

An innovative Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Demonstrates leadership with a strong collaborative mindset and proactive, pragmatic approach. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms using **FastAPI** and **Django**, and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Committed to compliance-driven development and MLOps, with hands-on expertise in **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
